About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

My Background

Now I am an international student at Century College for computer science major. I really like to study in the U.S, especially in Minnesota’s environment and living cost which allow me to live and study here. I think this major could provide many job’s opportunities and improve my life and family to be better in the future.

Accomplishments in CS

My study in CS

My plan is to complete my bachelor degree, computer science in Minnesota University and pursue the career here. the first semester of the computer science major in century college, I learned about programming basics and I also met some new friends in class that enlarged my society, met new friends. I am really interested in new technology like computer and internet, and I keep update the information and knowledge about IT which update every day.

Accomplishments in Extra-curricular

Other Activity

This semester I have joined the computer science club. It let me could meet people sharing the new information and knowledge about IT. For example, a club member shares the website about SciTechSperience program that provides the internship opportunities to intern or work in STEM company. This should benefit my major and the future career.

My Future Career

My dream will be come true soon

Recently, I keep on a new technology about A.I. I have self-studied and practice Python and R programming language on some website source online course like udamy.com, hackerrank.com and Youtube video that prepare for learning Machine Learning. I think it should benefit my career in the future because this knowledge and practice are the basis for study A.I, and I believe A.I would be very important in the future,
